mapper.sql: id, curriculumId, vipGrade, vipPrice, vipIntegral, giveIntegral, createTime, lastUpdate
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.curriculumId, p.vipGrade,l.level levelName, p.vipPrice, p.vipIntegral, p.giveIntegral, p.createTime, p.lastUpdate FROM bb_curriculum_uvip_price p left join abc12366_uc.uc_uvip_level l on p.vipGrade = l.levelCode WHERE p.curriculumId = #{curriculumId} ORDER BY vipGrade ASC
